item.title: codebase-operator
item.description:

item.title: gitlab
item.description:
Description

GitLab is the most comprehensive AI-powered DevSecOps Platform.

  • https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/charts/gitlab

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
gitlab-cert-manager default âœ… â€” 59 1 Critical
gitlab-cert-manager-cainjector default âœ… â€” 10 1 Critical
gitlab-gitlab-runner default âŒ â€” 1 1 Critical
gitlab-kube-state-metrics default âœ… â€” 32 1 Critical
gitlab-kubernetes-ingress default âŒ â€” 18 1 Critical
gitlab-nginx-ingress default âœ… â€” 26 1 Critical
gitlab-traefik default âŒ â€” 18 1 Critical
gitlab-prometheus-server default âŒ â€” 13 2 High
gitlab-cert-manager-webhook default âœ… â€” 3 1 Medium

gitlab-certmanager-issuer default âŒ â€” 1 1 Low
gitlab-shared-secrets default âŒ â€” 1 1 Low
gitlab-alertmanager default âœ… â€” 0 1 â€”
gitlab-gitlab-zoekt default âŒ â€” 0 3 â€”
gitlab-postgresql default âŒ â€” 0 2 â€”
gitlab-prometheus-node-exporter default âŒ â€” 0 1 â€”
gitlab-prometheus-pushgateway default âœ… â€” 0 1 â€”
gitlab-redis-master default âŒ â€” 0 2 â€”

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

item.title: gitlab-operator
item.description:
Description

The GitLab operator aims to manage the full lifecycle of GitLab instances in your Kubernetes or Openshift container platforms.

  • https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/cloud-native/gitlab-operator

Overview
